"Become a Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst and demonstrate your skills in data analysis and visualization.

The Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst certification is a great way to show employers that you have the skills they need to help them make better decisions with data. The certification requires passing the PL-300 exam, which measures your ability to prepare data, model data, visualize and analyze data, and deploy and maintain assets.

The courses on Microsoft Learn are free, so you can start learning today. The learning paths cover the skills measured by the exam, and they include interactive exercises, videos, and practice exams."

</br>

The courses on Microsoft Learn are free, but the certification exam costs $165 USD. The exam is available in multiple languages, and you can take it at a proctored testing center or online.
